definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life

sentences.english: The pulp of fruit is edible and tastes sweet and acidic.
sentences.chinese: 果瓣跟剥开的蒜瓣相似，果肉可食，味道酸甜。

sentences.english: Characteristics of Coke, fish is tender, and slightly tart taste delicious.
sentences.chinese: 特点是鱼肉外焦里嫩，味酸甜而稍有咸鲜。

sentences.english: We have tasted the sweets and bitters of life.
sentences.chinese: 我们尝到了人生的酸甜苦辣。

sentences.english: The drink is sweet and sour, good in texture.
sentences.chinese: 喝起来酸酸甜甜的，口感不错。

sentences.english: Suantiankula life is rich, red, orange, yellow, green, life is colorful.
sentences.chinese: 酸甜苦辣是生命的富有，赤橙黄绿是人生的斑斓。

sentences.english: Only full of ups and downs of life is the most meaningful.
sentences.chinese: 只有充满酸甜苦辣的生活才是最有意义的。

sentences.english: The product assume particular flavor and rich nutrition with proper acid-sweet flavor and healthy function.
sentences.chinese: 产品酸甜适口，风味独特，营养丰富，具有保健功能。

sentences.english: Bittersweet laugh instead of salty language, and then later at dusk, and Li Xiao also arrived.
sentences.chinese: 酸甜苦辣咸笑而不语，再后来黄昏晓和李铁也来了。

sentences.english: He has had his ups and downs in life.
sentences.chinese: 他的心情非常复杂，酸甜苦辣都有。

sentences.english: Balsamic vinegar is aged until it becomes dark and mellow, with a sweet-sour flavor.
sentences.chinese: 陈酿的香醋至颜色黑暗，味道醇厚酸甜。

sentences.english: The human tongue also detects saltiness, sourness, bitterness, and savoriness.
sentences.chinese: 人类的舌头同样可以体现酸甜苦辣。

sentences.english: Our taste buds allow us to detect sweet and sour, salty and savory, and, of course, bitter.
sentences.chinese: 我们的味蕾使我们能感受出酸甜咸辣，当然还有苦味。

sentences.english: To me , life is full of ups and downs.
sentences.chinese: 我已经历了人生的酸甜苦辣。

sentences.english: The barn was filled with the sour-sweet smell of fresh dung.
sentences.chinese: 谷仓里弥漫着新粪酸甜的气味。

sentences.english: Sweet and tart blackcurrant oil cushions the lips with plumping fatty acids.
sentences.chinese: 酸甜的黑醋栗油帮助双唇吸收丰富的脂肪酸。

sentences.english: Experienced the ups and downs, enjoyed the full moon waning moon.
sentences.chinese: 经历了酸甜苦辣，享受了月缺月圆。

definition: taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
to whet the appetite/appetizing/to amuse oneself at sb's expense/to tease
